sub_title: Agroecology and Resilience | Sophie van den Berg Consulting | joint MSc Food Identity

Teamleader Events
Managing and leading five event teams, with the objective to organize and ensure the proper execution of the events for the Intreeweek 2017. These events take place on locations such as “Koninklijk Theater Carré”, “de Kromhouthal”, “de Gashouder”, “Passenger Terminal Amsterdam”, “Artis”, “Paradiso”, “Melkweg” and “Sugar Factory”.

Responsible for
- the execution of the day to day operational activities of the different event teams
- ensuring that the different team objectives and deliverables are successfuly being achieved, within the committed time and allocated budget of €500.000
